_instructions: Add your work experience here. Copy the experience object for each job.

experiences.title: AI Automation Engineer
experiences.description: Enhanced Python automation frameworks with robust error handling, minimizing false positives and achieving zero critical defects across 50+ test suites.
responsibilities: Enhanced Python automation frameworks with robust error handling, minimizing false positives and achieving zero critical defects across 50+ test suites
Integrated ML-based validation checks into testing workflows, improving pre-release quality by 25%
Implemented automated testing frameworks within CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment failures by 20%
Accelerated test suite performance through parallelization strategies, diminishing test execution duration by 30%
Spearheaded a data validation pipeline using Great Expectations and Spark, reducing data-related incidents by 40%

experiences.title: Data Science Intern
experiences.description: Trained a TensorFlow CNN on 35,000+ retinal images, classifying five diabetic retinopathy stages with 96.3% accuracy.
responsibilities: Trained a TensorFlow CNN on 35,000+ retinal images, classifying five diabetic retinopathy stages with 96.3% accuracy
Engineered a data preprocessing pipeline featuring image resizing, normalization, and augmentation, achieving a 28% reduction in training loss over 25 epochs
Applied SHAP-based explainability analysis on model predictions, identifying top 5 key retinal features to support responsible AI practices
Optimized model inference time by 35% through quantization while maintaining accuracy
Deployed model as a proof-of-concept via API endpoint, processing 12 images per minute
